name: Runner - Commodore VIC-20 [FREE]
description:
For the unexpanded Commodore VIC-20.

Reach the end of the road.

It is gradualy getting narrower and there are obstacles, which you have to avoid.

In higher levels, the road are longer and there
are more obstacles.

You will get one point by every step you take
and 100 points if you enter the next level.
